TCName.name: CreateUniqueAdhocStocktake
TCName.Getarticle: select a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_listing a,saap.zwowc_article_master b where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.mtart <> 'VERP'

TCName.name: CreationValidations
TCName.Getarticle: select a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_listing a,saap.zwowc_article_master b where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.mtart <> 'VERP'

TCName.name: CreateUniqueOnlineStocktake
TCName.Getarticle: select a.matnr from saap.zwowc_article_listing a,saap.zwowc_article_master b where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.mtart <> 'VERP'

TCName.name: CreateHierarchyLevelStocktake
TCName.alldepartments: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='ALL DEPARTMENTS'
TCName.nodevalue: SELECT NODE_NAME,NODE_ID FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_HIERARCHY where PARENT_NODE='nodeval'

TCName.name: BasecountReport
TCName.STO: select Stocktake_id from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR where Stocktake_name='STNAME'
TCName.COUNT: SELECT count(matnr) FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_PLANO_LOC_DTL A JOIN SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL B ON (A.STOCKTAKE_ID=B.STOCKTAKE_ID) WHERE A.STOCKTAKE_ID='CHECK'

TCName.name: BasecountReportValidation
TCName.STO: select Stocktake_id from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR where Stocktake_name='STNAME'
TCName.Check: SELECT MATNR,meins,article_desc,om,count,count_wgt,count_RC1,Count_WGT_RC1,count_RC2,Count_WGT_RC2,count_RC3,Count_WGT_RC3,count_RC4,Count_WGT_RC4 FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value' and matnr='Art' UNION SELECT MATNR,meins,article_desc,om,count,count_wgt,count_RC1,Count_WGT_RC1,count_RC2,Count_WGT_RC2,count_RC3,Count_WGT_RC3,count_RC4,Count_WGT_RC4 FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value' and matnr='Art'

TCName.name: BasecountPageValidation
TCName.STO: select Stocktake_id from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR where Stocktake_name='STNAME'
TCName.Check: SELECT MATNR,meins,article_desc,om,count FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value' and matnr='Art' UNION SELECT MATNR,meins,article_desc,om,count FROM SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value' and matnr='Art'
TCName.SUBCAT: select SUB_CAT_NAME from SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value' UNION SELECT SUB_CAT_NAME FROM saap. LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL where Stocktake_id='value'
TCName.Aisles: select distinct AISLE from SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value'
TCName.OtherLoc: SELECT distinct ST_LOC_ID FROM saap.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL where Stocktake_id='value'
TCName.UserName: select distinct USR_NM from saap.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value' UNION SELECT distinct USR_NM FROM saap. LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC where Stocktake_id='value'
TCName.Details: select Source,complete_name,Stocktake_date from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR WHERE STOCKTAKE_ID='value'
TCName.FREQ: select b.freq_name, b.freq_code from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR a, saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_FREQ b where a.freq_code = b.freq_code and a.STOCKTAKE_ID='value'

TCName.name: BasecountFiltersWithRecords
TCName.STO: select Stocktake_id from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR where Stocktake_name='STNAME'
TCName.AISLES: select distinct Aisle from SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC where Stocktake_id='value'
TCName.OTHERLOC: select distinct b.loc_name from saap.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL a,saap. ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_LOC_HDR b where a.ST_LOC_ID = b.loc_id and a.Stocktake_id='value'

TCName.name: BasecountFilters
TCName.STO: select Stocktake_id from saap.ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_SCHED_HDR where Stocktake_name='STNAME'
TCName.AISLES: select distinct Aisle from SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_PLANO_LOC where Stocktake_id='value'
TCName.OTHERLOC: select distinct b.loc_name from saap.LOCAL_WOW_STOCKTAKE_COUNT_DTL a,saap. ZWOWC_STOCKTAKE_LOC_HDR b where a.ST_LOC_ID = b.loc_id and a.Stocktake_id='value'
